Arrangement.text:
(PRE-CHORUS) In h[D2]istory You live[A/C#]d and died You bro[Bm7]ke the chains You ros[E]e to life
Chorus 1: You are the hop[A]e living in u[D]s You are the Ro[E]ck in whom we t[A]rust You are the lig[F#m]ht shining for [D]all the world to s[E]ee [D2/F#] You rose from the d[A]ead conquering fe[D]ar Our Prince of Pe[E]ace drawing us ne[A]ar Jesus our ho[F#m]pe living for a[D]ll who will rece[E]ive [D2]Lord we believe (REPEAT)
Verse 1: [A]Jesus h[D/A]ope of the nations [A]Jesus c[D/A]omfort for all who mou[F#m11]rn You a[E]re the source of he[D2]aven's hope on ear[E]th [A]Jesus l[D/A]ight in the darkness [A]Jesus t[D]ruth in each circumstance [F#m11]You are[E] the source of h[D2]eaven's light on ear[E]th
Arrangement.searchtext: prechorus in history you lived and died you broke the chains you rose to life chorus 1 you are the hope living in us you are the rock in whom we trust you are the light shining for all the world to see you rose from the dead conquering fear our prince of peace drawing us near jesus our hope living for all who will receive lord we believe repeat verse 1 jesus hope of the nations jesus comfort for all who mourn you are the source of heavens hope on earth jesus light in the darkness jesus truth in each circumstance you are the source of heavens light on earth
